Package de.ralleytn.simple.audio

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Audio
    Interface containing all the methods a good audio implementation should have.
    AudioListener
    Listens to audio events.
    HeadReader
    Is implemented by all classes whith the purpose of reading the head informations from an audio file.
    Playable
    Implemented by everything that can be played.
    PlaylistListener
    Listens to playlist events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAudio
    Implements the Audio and should be extended by all classes representing a form of playable audio.
    AudioEvent
    Represents an audio event.
    BufferedAudio
    Reads the entire audio data into the RAM.
    OggHeadReader
    Reads the head informations from an Ogg Vorbis file as described here.
    Playlist
    Stores multiple Audios and plays them in a batch.
    PlaylistEvent
    Represents a playlist event.
    Recorder
    Records audio from an input device.
    StreamedAudio
    Never loads the entire audio data into the RAM.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AudioEvent.Type
    Represents a type that an audio event can be.
    FileFormat
    Represents a file format for audio files.
    PlaylistEvent.Type
    Represents a type that a playlist event can be.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AudioException
    Is thrown when an error inside of SimpleAudio happens.
